components.name: File Roll Sink
components.description: Stores events on the local filesystem.

sink.directory.name: Sink directory
sink.directory.description: The directory where files will be stored

sink.rollInterval.name: Sink roll interval
sink.rollInterval.description: Roll the file every 30 seconds. Specifying 0 will disable rolling and cause all events to be written to a single file.

sink.serializer.name: Sink serializer
sink.serializer.description: Other possible options include avro_event or the FQCN of an implementation of EventSerializer.Builder interface.
